qu1: Always remember, your focus determines your reality
qu2: I realized that in a lot of failures, there is a lot of opportunities.
qu3: If you want to get rich, think of saving as earning
qu4: Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.
qu5: I believe you have to be willing to be misunderstood if you’re going to innovate.
qu6: Always discover your vision and the rest will follow.
qu7: It’s not about the money. It’s about the passion.
qu8: An investment in knowledge pays the best dividends.
qu9: It’s all about dreams.  Dreams cost nothing, they are free.
qu10: If you don’t play to win, don’t play at all.
qu11: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
qu12: I believe that most successful people are ordinary people with extraordinary determination.
